triples.name: Granular computing
triples.relevance: Granular computing is the foundational paradigm upon which granular-ball computing (GBC) is built.

triples.name: Statistical classification
triples.relevance: The paper addresses classification problems using granular-ball computing methods.

triples.name: K-means clustering
triples.relevance: The paper proposes accelerating GB generation by replacing k-means with division-based methods.

triples.name: Adaptive algorithm
triples.relevance: The paper introduces a new adaptive method for GB generation that is parameter-free and completely adaptive.
